title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Breda's secrets revealed as she dies during big stunt week?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Breda McQueen (Moya Brady) has been holding Tony Hutchinson (Nick Pickard) captive up at the pig farm for several months now in Hollyoaks but — in the coming episodes — she decides to let him return home. However, the following day, she gets caught up in the devastation taking place within the village as part of the show’s massive stunt week, so will her murderous secrets come to light?

The last few weeks have seen Breda lose control of her own situation, and with Sylver (David Tag), Goldie (Chelsee Healey) and Jack (Jimmy McKenna) all beginning to ask questions, she realises that she needs to be more careful.

After much deliberation, she decides that — in spite of her developing friendship with him — Tony needs to die if she’s going to keep her secrets hidden. However, she later receives a phone call from Goldie, and — as a result of this conversation— has a change of heart. Shockingly she agrees to let Tony go home.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

The following morning, freedom beckons for Tony, as the day of his release arrives — but will Breda follow through with her promise?

Later, her car crashes into one of the cranes in the village — which results in a crack originating in the floor of the village. Afterwards, Breda’s unconscious, and everyone rushes to her aid?

Walter (Trevor A Toussaint) gets involved in the rescue mission and asks Tom (Ellis Hollins) and Darren (Ashley Taylor Dawson) for help in moving Breda’s car.

Is Breda dead?

What’s more, will her status as a serial killer come to light? It’s currently unknown whether or not she followed through with her plan to take Tony home, so could he perhaps be in her presence?

One to watch: Monday 29th October at 7pm on E4.
